author: Arizona Republic, Lauren Castle and Anne Ryman, Arizona Republic
title: Jodi Arias won't get new trial, despite prosecutor Juan Martinez's 'egregious' court behavior
description: The court ruled that Jodi Arias will stay in prison for the 2008 first-degree murder of her sometime-boyfriend Travis Alexander.
content:
Last SlideNext Slide
PHOENIX A nationally known murderer will stay behind bars despite the prosecutor's "egregious" misconduct during the trial, the Arizona Court of Appeals has ruled.
The court ruled Tuesday that Jodi Arias, 39, will remain in prison for l… [+9577 chars]
